mapper.select: select a.CHARTID as "ID" , a.inid as "ZYID", b.intimes as "VisitId", b.inhosno as "PatientId", a.RECORDDATE as "StoolDate", c.dictname as "TemperatureTypeName", a.TEMPERATUREVALUE as "TwValue", d.PATIENTWEIGHT as "TzValue" from ipr_inpatientinfo b,com_dictcodeinfo c,IPM_TEMPERATURECHART_EXT a left join IPM_TEMPERATURECHART d on a.orgcode=d.orgcode and a.inid=d.inid and a.RECORDDATE=d.RECORDDATE where a.orgcode=b.orgcode and a.inid=b.inid and a.TEMPERATURETYPE=c.dictcode and c.typecode='TEMPERATURETYPE' and a.orgcode=#{map.OrgCode} and a.inid=#{map.ID} and to_char(a.RECORDDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')>=#{map.StartDate} and to_char(a.RECORDDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')<=#{map.EndDate} group by a.CHARTID,a.inid,b.intimes,b.inhosno ,a.RECORDDATE,c.dictname,a.TEMPERATUREVALUE,d.PATIENTWEIGHT
